hiveArticle.title: Light and Sound this Diwali - Happy Diwali to All
hiveArticle.body:
In my previous post I have shown how [Indians are gearing up for Diwali Festival]() I would like to continue the discussion and show you how I have celebrated it. May this Diwali bring Happiness and Prosperity in your lives.

​

![IMG_20171019_ 202102.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmaCRWwRgy4MA762HGNxeRYFq1dfaLZ1XHzU22ojYzJncR/IMG_20171019\__202102.jpg)

​

![IMG_20171019_ 202248.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcBAgVaDVsT5QCrFHVyPmu4d3d9o2cMekFQkmM6qmTVn4/IMG_20171019\__202248.jpg)

​

![IMG_20171019_ 203445.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmavpfo3VZX53iSyDUS9kFF2NfnPy8vRn61Qxg22NQ6gHR/IMG_20171019\__203445.jpg)

​

![IMG_20171019_ 224113.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmapUJmLBN6GyuqNQeH16Tq5ASQsjxhHSqUrkSgTheMoQD/IMG_20171019\__224113.jpg)

​

![IMG_20171019_ 225122.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZTg9YAHeZ3E1Wxr56hbfJw1vHqpcQ2e3vNDvQq5eEpNZ/IMG_20171019\__225122.jpg)
